document.title: Z-Wave Alliance Launches IoT Competition to Reward Start-Ups for Their Innovation in the Smart Home
document.author: Cdric Locqueneux
document.text: In order to accelerate innovation on the Z-Wave platform and lower the barrier of entry for new companies to develop IoT products, the program will reward one selected individual/company each month starting in May 2015 with a 12-month membership to the Z-Wave Alliance as well as one of the newly available IoT-ready 500 Series Z-Wave Developer Kits from Sigma Designs. Lire larticle complet sur HomeToys Z-wave Z-Wave Alliance
